nonce.description: The nonce of the metablock used to compose the hyperblock.

hash.description: The hex-encoded hash of this metablock (hyperblock).

prevBlockHash.description: The hex-encoded hash of the previous metablock (hyperblock).

numTxs.description: The number of included fully-executed transactions, as a result of notarizing their parent miniblocks at destination shard.

shardBlocks.description: Contains an array of blocks notarized in the metablock (the basis of the hyperblock abstraction).

transactions.description: The fully executed transactions, whose parent miniblocks were notarized in the metablock (the basis of the hyperblock abstraction).
